name: Liability for unlawful distributions
text:
(a)  Unless a director complies with the applicable standards of conduct described in section 414D-149, a director who votes for or assents to a distribution made in violation of this chapter shall be personally liable to the corporation for the amount of the distribution that exceeds what could have been distributed without violating this chapter. 	(b)  A director held liable for an unlawful distribution under subsection (a) is entitled to contribution from:



	(1)	Every other director who voted for or assented to the distribution without complying with the applicable standards of conduct described in section 414D-149; and
	(2)	Each person who received an unlawful distribution for the amount of the distribution whether or not the person receiving the distribution knew it was made in violation of this chapter. [L 2001, c 105, pt of §1]
